data.name: AuthorizationPolicySchema
data.value: <xs:schema targetNamespace="http://schemas.authz.org/capl" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns="http://schemas.authz.org/capl" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:element name="AuthorizationPolicy" type="AuthorizationPolicyType" /> <xs:element name="LogicalAnd" type="LogicalConnectiveType" /> <xs:element name="LogicalOr" type="LogicalConnectiveType" /> <xs:element name="Rule" type="RuleType" /> <xs:element name="Operation" type="OperationType" /> <xs:element name="Match" type="MatchType" /> <xs:element name="Transforms" type="TransformsType" /> <xs:element name="Transform" type="TransformType" /> <xs:element name="TargetClaim" type="LiteralClaimType" /> <xs:complexType name="AuthorizationPolicyType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:choice> <xs:element ref="LogicalAnd"/> <xs:element ref="LogicalOr"/> <xs:element ref="Rule" /> </xs:choice> <xs:element ref="Transforms" minOccurs="0" /> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="PolicyID" type="xs:anyURI" use="optional" /> <xs:attribute name="Delegation" type="xs:boolean" use="optional" default="false" /> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="LogicalConnectiveType"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="TermType"> <xs:choice maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:element ref="LogicalAnd" /> <xs:element ref="LogicalOr" /> <xs:element ref="Rule" /> </xs:choice> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="TermType" abstract="true"> <xs:attribute name="Evaluates" type="xs:boolean" /> <xs:attribute name="TermID" type="xs:anyURI" /> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="RuleType"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="TermType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element ref="Operation" /> <xs:element ref="Match" /> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="Issuer" type="xs:string" use="optional" /> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="MatchType" mixed="true"> <xs:attribute name="Type" type="MatchTypes" use="required" /> <xs:attribute name="ClaimType" type="xs:string" use="required" /> <xs:attribute name="Required" type="xs:boolean" use="optional" default="true" /> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="OperationType" mixed="true"> <xs:attribute name="OperationType" type="OperationTypes" /> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="TransformsType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element ref="Transform" maxOccurs="unbounded" /> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="TransformType" abstract="true"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element ref="Match" /> <xs:element ref="TargetClaim" minOccurs="0" /> <xs:choice minOccurs="0"> <xs:element ref="LogicalAnd" /> <xs:element ref="LogicalOr" /> <xs:element ref="Rule" /> </xs:choice> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="Type" type="TransformTypes" use="required" /> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="LiteralClaimType" mixed="true"> <xs:attribute name="ClaimType" type="xs:string" use="required" /> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="OperationTypes"> <xs:restriction base="xs:anyURI"> <xs:enumeration value="http://schemas.authz.org/capl/operation#Equal" /> <xs:enumeration value="http://schemas.authz.org/capl/operation#NotEqual" /> <xs:enumeration value="http://schemas.authz.org/capl/operation#Exists" /> <xs:enumeration value="http://schemas.authz.org/capl/operation#EqualDateTime" /> <xs:enumeration value="http://schemas.authz.org/capl/operation#EqualNumeric" /> <xs:enumeration value="http://schemas.authz.org/capl/operation#GreaterThan" /> <xs:enumeration value="http://schemas.authz.org/capl/operation#GreaterThanOrEqual" /> <xs:enumeration value="http://schemas.authz.org/capl/operation#GreaterThanDateTime" /> <xs:enumeration value="http://schemas.authz.org/capl/operation#GreaterThanOrEqualDateTime" /> <xs:enumeration value="http://schemas.authz.org/capl/operation#LessThan" /> <xs:enumeration value="http://schemas.authz.org/capl/operation#LessThanDateTime" /> <xs:enumeration value="http://schemas.authz.org/capl/operation#LessThanOrEqual" /> <xs:enumeration value="http://schemas.authz.org/capl/operation#LessThanOrEqualDateTime" /> <xs:enumeration value="http://schemas.authz.org/capl/operation#Contains" /> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="MatchTypes"> <xs:restriction base="xs:anyURI"> <xs:enumeration value="http://schemas.authz.org/capl/match#Literal" /> <xs:enumeration value="http://schemas.authz.org/capl/match#Pattern" /> <xs:enumeration value="http://schemas.authz.org/capl/match#ComplexType" /> <xs:enumeration value="http://schemas.authz.org/capl/match#Any" /> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="TransformTypes"> <xs:restriction base="xs:anyURI"> <xs:enumeration value="http://schemas.authz.org/capl/transform#Add" /> <xs:enumeration value="http://schemas.authz.org/capl/transform#Remove" /> <xs:enumeration value="http://schemas.authz.org/capl/transform#Replace" /> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema>

data.name: IssuePolicySchema
data.value: <xs:schema targetNamespace="http://schemas.authz.org/cipl" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns="http://schemas.authz.org/cipl" xmlns:az="http://schemas.authz.org/capl" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:import namespace="http://schemas.authz.org/capl" /> <xs:element name="IssuePolicy" type="IssuePolicyType" /> <xs:complexType name="IssuePolicyType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Transforms" type="az:TransformsType" /> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="PolicyID" type="xs:anyURI" use="optional" /> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>
